import React from "react"; import { Component } from "react"; class Union extends Component { render() { return(

{ event.preventDefault() const cropname=this.cropname.value const location= this.location.value //const price=this.price.value const kg=this.kg.value const priceperkg=window.web3.utils.fromWei(product.price.toString(), 'Ether') const cropstate=this.cropstate.value this.props.postUnion(event,cropname,kg,location,priceperkg,cropstate) }}>
{ this.cropname = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="enter the crop type union accepts" required />
{ this.location = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="enter the union location" required />
{this.kg= input}} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter the max kg" required />
{this.priceperkg= input}} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter the price per kg offered farmer" required />
{this.cropstate= input}} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter the crop state" required />

) } } export default Union;
